API_FUNC_CERT_HANDLER_GET_CA_CERT.api_signature: esp_err_t cert_handler_get_ca_cert(const char** cert_data, size_t* cert_len)
API_FUNC_CERT_HANDLER_GET_CA_CERT.content:
Get embedded CA certificate data (PEM format) generated during build.

**Signature:**

.. code-block:: c

   esp_err_t cert_handler_get_ca_cert(const char** cert_data, size_t* cert_len);

**Parameters:**

* ``cert_data`` - Pointer to CA certificate data (null-terminated)
* ``cert_len`` - Length of CA certificate data including null terminator

**Returns:**

* ``ESP_OK`` - Success
* ``ESP_ERR_INVALID_ARG`` - Parameters are NULL
API_FUNC_CERT_HANDLER_GET_CA_CERT.returns: ESP_OK on success, error codes otherwise
API_FUNC_CERT_HANDLER_GET_CA_CERT.title: cert_handler_get_ca_cert
